Replaces the current file history with a new one.

Parameters:
jsonString - The file history we are replacing the old one with in json format

load

public java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> load(java.lang.String filename)
Loads comments from cache. Comments loaded get put into the registered comment list model. Thus registration must precede the load.

Parameters:
filename - The filename where we are to load comments from
currentActivity - The activity requesting the load
Returns:
ArrayList
